title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7050.3 - Review of application for a variance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7050.3 - Review of application for a variance

State Regulations
(a) The State Commission of Correction shall
issue a written determination upon any application made pursuant to this Part. Such written determination shall include the specific facts and reasons
underlying the determination. If the variance is granted, the New York State

Commission of Correction shall stipulate: (1)
where applicable, the time period for which the variance is granted; and
(2)
any requirements imposed by
the State Commission of Correction as conditions upon the variance. (b) The State Commission of

Correction shall issue the written determination required pursuant to
subdivision (a) of this section within 30 days after receipt of an application
for a variance made pursuant to this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7050.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
